sentences.english: According to the regulations of Ministry of Education, hourly payment is based on the actual teaching hours.
sentences.chinese: 授課鐘點費依教育部規定按實際授課時數覈實支給。

sentences.english: According to the regulations of Ministry of Education, hourly payment is based on the actual teaching hours.
sentences.chinese: 授課鐘點費依教育部規定按實際授課時數覈實支給。

sentences.english: During the typical class session, we will analyze two papers in a discussion-based format.
sentences.chinese: 在授課過程中，我們會以討論爲基礎分析兩篇論文。

sentences.english: Now I\'ve benefited a lot from lectures and many other academic reports.
sentences.chinese: 我從老師的授課和其他許多學術報告中獲益匪淺。

sentences.english: The teaching method of those famous professors is always quotes .
sentences.chinese: 名教授的授課方式從來都是引經論典的。

sentences.english: Students can get a lot from a video of a lecture given by a great teacher.
sentences.chinese: 通過名師的授課視頻，學生們着實收穫良多。
填鴨式授課還是互動式教學？

sentences.english: A reading list for the class, divided up by lecture.
sentences.chinese: 課程閱讀資料表依授課單元分列如後。

sentences.english: The course is delivered by experienced industrial trainer and in Chinese language.
sentences.chinese: 本課程由企業培訓師講授，授課語言爲中文。

sentences.english: Expressing Teaching is an expressing activity of the classroom teaching strategy by the teacher.
sentences.chinese: “說課”是授課者對課堂教學策略的表述活動。

sentences.english: Topics of instruction include everything from balance sheets to computer networks.
sentences.chinese: 授課包括從決算表到計算機網絡的一切內容。

sentences.english: The course is delivered by experienced industrial trainer and in English language.
sentences.chinese: 本課程由企業培訓師講授，授課語言爲英文。

sentences.english: Even what you learn during the four years of university will be sth quite superficial too.
sentences.chinese: 就是大學四年，所授課業也還是相當粗淺的學識。

sentences.english: In order to ensure a quality teaching experience, class sizes will be kept small.
sentences.chinese: 爲了確保授課質量，此次培訓將採取小班授課。

sentences.english: In order to ensure a quality teaching experience, class sizes will be kept small.
sentences.chinese: 爲了確保授課質量，此次培訓將採取小班授課。

sentences.english: And there are a range of English-taught courses.
sentences.chinese: 德國也提供衆多英語授課課程。

definition: to teach/teaching and learning/education/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4]
student/member of an institution of learning/officer cadet
master's degree/person who has a master's degree/learned person
to open/to start (a business etc)/to set up
specialty/specialized field/main field of study (at university)/major/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4]/professional
